rooms.description: Spacious living area with modern finishes and an open layout. The space is designed to accommodate wheelchair accessibility.
Well-equipped kitchen featuring accessible design, ample storage, and ergonomic countertops for ease of use. Adheres to local building norms.
Dining space integrated within the living area. The layout fosters social interaction while maintaining clear navigation paths for wheelchair access.
Luxury master bedroom designed with a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom, ensuring accessibility and privacy.
Accessible bathroom design with grab bars and non-slip flooring. Features wheelchair-accessible fixtures in accordance to Vastu principles of cleanliness.
